title: Short-Intensive Course for Integrating Computational Thinking and Mathematical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and understanding of simple programming concepts
context.additional_context: Interactive classroom environment utilizing real-time video conferencing systems and digital tools

learning_goals: Integrate computational thinking (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, algorithm design) and mathematical reasoning (logical analysis, modeling, data interpretation) when solving real-life problems
Design algorithms to solve mathematical problems using visual programming tools like Scratch or Entry
Complete project-based assessment tasks through collaboration and produce final outputs incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
